channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Jimmy Carter had an early ally in the Senate: a young Democrat named Joe Biden
item.description: When they met in the mid-1970s, Jimmy Carter and Joe Biden were both political underdogs. They forged a strong friendship that lasted more than 50 years.
item.content:encoded: When they met in the mid-1970s, Jimmy Carter and Joe Biden were both political underdogs. They forged a strong friendship that lasted more than 50 years.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: 10 essential books about Jimmy Carter
item.description: Throughout his lifetime, Jimmy Carter took on many titles: 39th President of the United States, Nobel Peace Prize winner, philanthropist, humanitarian, artist – and writer.
item.content:encoded:
Throughout his lifetime, Jimmy Carter took on many titles: 39th President of the United States, Nobel Peace Prize winner, philanthropist, humanitarian, artist – and writer.

(Image credit: Drew Angerer)
item.dc:creator: Teresa Xie

item.title: Four years after the Capitol riot, why QAnon hasn't gone away
item.description: QAnon followers played an outsized role in the Jan. 6, 2021 riot at the U.S. Capitol. While the online conspiracy community is less prominent now, it still draws attention from GOP politicians.
item.content:encoded:
QAnon followers played an outsized role in the Jan. 6, 2021 riot at the U.S. Capitol. While the online conspiracy community is less prominent now, it still draws attention from GOP politicians.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Jude Joffe-Block

item.title: For seniors with hoarding disorder, a support group helps with stigma and isolation
item.description: Concern is growing about the prevalence of hoarding disorder among seniors, and the lack of access to effective treatments. Some have found coping strategies — and community — in a support group.
item.content:encoded:
Concern is growing about the prevalence of hoarding disorder among seniors, and the lack of access to effective treatments. Some have found coping strategies — and community — in a support group.

(Image credit: trekandshoot)
item.dc:creator: Sarah Boden

item.title: Bird flu Q&A: What to know to help protect yourself and your pets
item.description: Each week some revelation about bird flu seems to flutter through the news cycle. Here's what the latest research is saying about how it is spreading and how to keep yourself and your pets safe.
item.content:encoded:
Each week some revelation about bird flu seems to flutter through the news cycle. Here's what the latest research is saying about how it is spreading and how to keep yourself and your pets safe.

(Image credit: Anadolu/Anadolu via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: 2024 in photos: NPR station photographers share memorable moments
item.description: NPR's member and affiliate station photographers share memorable moments from throughout 2024.
item.content:encoded:

NPR's member and affiliate station photographers share memorable moments from throughout 2024.

item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Carter made the decision to establish relations with China
item.description: Carter helped make ties between Washington and Beijing, ushering in an era of engagement that brought China out of isolation and underpinned its meteoric economic rise.
item.content:encoded:
Carter helped make ties between Washington and Beijing, ushering in an era of engagement that brought China out of isolation and underpinned its meteoric economic rise.

(Image credit: Jimmy Carter Library)
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch

item.title: At least 3 migrants die trying to cross the English Channel
item.description: This latest incident comes as 2024 is named the deadliest year on record for small boat crossings along the perilous migration route.
item.content:encoded:
This latest incident comes as 2024 is named the deadliest year on record for small boat crossings along the perilous migration route.

(Image credit: Rafael Yaghobzadeh)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Rosman

item.title: These were the most-borrowed books from public libraries in 2024
item.description: Many of the most-borrowed books in 2024, including 'romantasy' titles and memoirs, also appeared on public library lists in 2023.
item.content:encoded:
Many of the most-borrowed books in 2024, including 'romantasy' titles and memoirs, also appeared on public library lists in 2023.

(Image credit: Magali Cohen)
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: Jimmy Carter gave Panama control of the canal. It's one of his most controversial achievements
item.description: Handing control of the Panama Canal from the U.S. over to the Central American country was one of President Jimmy Carter's most controversial, and most overshadowed, foreign policy achievements.
item.content:encoded: Handing control of the Panama Canal from the U.S. over to the Central American country was one of President Jimmy Carter's most controversial, and most overshadowed, foreign policy achievements.
item.dc:creator: Rolando Arrieta
